sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.UXBannerAnnouncementGetFields</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Returns the banner announcement record as an object</description> <name>UXBannerAnnouncementGetFields</name> <script><![CDATA[var UXBannerAnnouncementGetFields = Class.create(); UXBannerAnnouncementGetFields.prototype = { initialize: function() {}, getFields: function(param) { return ({ "heading": param.getValue('heading'), "summary": param.getValue('summary'), "start": param.getValue('start'), "end": param.getValue('end'), "add_link": param.getValue('add_link'), "link_label": param.getValue('link_label'), "link_url": param.getValue('link_url'), "link_click_behavior": param.getValue('link_click_behavior'), "icon": param.getValue('icon'), "icon_tooltip": param.getValue('icon_tooltip'), "color": param.getValue('color'), "order": param.getValue('order'), "experience": param.getValue('experience'), "show_for": param.getValue('show_for'), "roles": param.getValue('roles'), "group": param.getValue('group'), "contentPosition": param.getValue('content_position'), "sysId": param.sys_id, "nonDismissible": param.non_dismissible, "nonStackable": param.non_stackable }); }, getReferences: function (param) { return ({ "heading": param.heading, "summary": param.summary, "start": param.start, "end": param.end, "add_link": param.add_link, "link_label": param.link_label, "link_url": param.link_url, "link_click_behavior": param.link_click_behavior, "icon": param.icon, "icon_tooltip": param.icon_tooltip, "color": param.color, "order": param.order, "experience": param.experience, "show_for": param.show_for, "roles": param.roles, "group": param.group, "sysId": param.sys_id, "contentPosition": param.content_position, "nonDismissible": param.non_dismissible, "nonStackable": param.non_stackable }); }, type: 'UXBannerAnnouncementGetFields' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-08-10 21:36:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>63774b479c3d3010f877672f33c2b0cf</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>UXBannerAnnouncementGetFields</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Banner Announcements - NOW Experiences" source="com.snc.banner_announcements">6807f0283cb1311068bcf327dfe37fac</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_63774b479c3d3010f877672f33c2b0cf</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-23 22:49:02</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
